page.title: 09BRIDGE OF WEIR - GAMES
page.content: Games played by children in the B.O.W. area, fall mainly into three catagories,chasing games, ball games and singing games. { Chasing games}such as{Blue Murder}and {Chain Tig}are enjoyed both by boys and girls because they are fast moving action packed games,which are full of fun and excitement. { Ball games}such as football and netball are popular because they are {team games}which develop skills such as control,balance and aim.It is a thrill if you win by scoring a goal or making a good save. { Singing games}such as{The Farmer's In {His Den}and others are mainly enjoyed by girls because of their lively tunes and jazzy rhythms.
